name: NFTEarth
description: Buy and Sell NFTs on L2. NFTEarth is a an NFT marketplace built on Layer2 Ethereum scaling solutions. The L2 ecosystem is ripe for growth. While there has been success building out a competitive marketplace of protocols on Ethereum mainnet, L2 still presents tremendous opportunity for NFT protocols. NFTEarth aims to serve as not only a marketplace, but additionally as an educational hub for new users to be on-boarded to Web3 and learn about NFTs - from generative artwork, to the smart contracts involved, to creating and managing allowlists. The protocol is currently live on Optimism and Arbitrum.
